import React, { Component,useState } from "react"; const ModalRoom = () => { const [room_name, setName]= useState(""); const onSubmitForm = async e =>{ e.preventDefault(); try { const body = {room_name}; const response= await fetch ("http://localhost:8000/rooms", { method:"Post", headers:{"Content-Type": "application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify(body) }); window.location="/" } catch (err) { console.error(err.message); } } return (
{/* Button trigger modal */} {/* Modal */}
Room
setName(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default ModalRoom;
